document.full_text: providence has rehired 1,445 of the nearly 2,000 teachers it had dismissed in february as part of an effort to boost the city's precarious finances.
document.title: providence rehires roughly 75 percent of laid off teachers
lines_and_colors: providence has rehired 1,445 of the nearly 2,000 teachers it had dismissed in february as part of an effort to boost the city's precarious finances.
